original: vikāraśabdān neti cen na prācuryāt / BBs_1,1.14 /
analyzed: vikāra śabdāt na iti ced na prācuryāt

original: asminn asya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti / BBs_1,1.20 /
analyzed: asmin asya ca tad yogam śāsti  /

original: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam / BBs_1,1.26 /
analyzed: chandaḥ abhidhānāt na iti ced na tathā cetaḥ ūrpaṇa nigadāt tathā hi darśanam
bhūta ādi pāda vyapadeśa upapatteḥ ca evam

original: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt / BBs_1,1.28 /
analyzed: upadeśa bhedāt na iti ced na ubhayasmin api avirodhāt

original: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin / BBs_1,1.30 /
analyzed: na vaktuḥ ātma upadeśāt iti ced adhyātma saṃbandha bhūmā hi asmin
śāstra dṛṣṭyā tu upadeśaḥ vāmadeva vat

original: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt / BBs_1,1.32 /
analyzed: jīva mukhya prāṇa liṅgāt na iti ced na upāsā traividhyāt āśrita tvāt iha tad yogāt

original: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca / BBs_1,2.7 /
analyzed: arbhakaustvāt tad vyapadeśāt ca na iti ced na nicāyya tvāt evam vyoma vat ca

original: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt / BBs_1,2.8 /
analyzed: saṃbhoga prāptiḥ iti ced na vaiśeṣyāt

original: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
analyzed: guhām praviṣṭau ātmānau hi tad darśanāt

original: ata eva ca sa brahma / BBs_1,2.16 /

analyzed: antaryāmi adhidaiva adhiloka ādiṣu tad dharma vyapadeśāt

original: na ca smārtam ataddharmābhilāpāc chārīraś ca / BBs_1,2.20 /
analyzed: na ca smārtam a tad dharma abhilāpāt śārīraḥ ca
ubhaye pi hi bhedena enam adhīyate   /
adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ dharma ukteḥ
viśeṣaṇa bheda vyapadeśābhyām ca na itarau

original: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād asambhavāt puruṣamapi cainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.27 /
analyzed: śabda ādibhyaḥ ntar pratiṣṭhānāt ca na iti ced na tathā dṛṣṭi upadeśāt asambhavāt puruṣam api ca enam adhīyate  /

original: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca / BBs_1,2.28 /
analyzed: atas eva na devatā bhūtam ca

original: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati / BBs_1,2.32 /
analyzed: saṃpatteḥ iti jaiminiḥ tathā hi darśayati
dyu bhū ādi āyatanam sva śabdāt  /

original: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca / BBs_1,3.14 /
analyzed: gati śabdābhyām tathā hi dṛṣṭam liṅgam ca
dhṛteḥ ca mahimnaḥ sya asmin upalabdheḥ

original: itaraparāmarśāt sa iti cen nāsaṃbhavāt / BBs_1,3.17 /
analyzed: itara parāmarśāt saḥ iti ced na asaṃbhavāt

original: alpaśruter iti cet tad uktam / BBs_1,3.20 /
analyzed: alpa śruteḥ iti ced tat uktam
hṛdi apekṣayā tu manuṣya adhikāra tvāt

original: virodhaḥ karmaṇīti cen nānekapratipatter darśanāt / BBs_1,3.26 /
analyzed: virodhaḥ karmaṇi iti ced na aneka pratipatteḥ darśanāt  /

original: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām / BBs_1,3.27 /
analyzed: śabdaḥ iti ced na atas prabhavāt pratyakṣa anumānābhyām
samāna nāma rūpa tvāt ca avṛttau api avirodhaḥ darśanāt smṛteḥ ca

original: śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi / BBs_1,3.33 /
analyzed: śugasya tad anādara śravaṇāt tad ādravaṇāt sūcyate hi

original: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca / BBs_1,4.1 /
analyzed: ānumānikam api ekeṣām iti ced na śarīra rūpaka vinyasta gṛhīteḥ darśayati ca

original: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt / BBs_1,4.5 /
analyzed: vadati iti ced na prājñaḥ hi prakaraṇāt

original: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca / BBs_1,4.6 /
analyzed: trayāṇām eva ca evam upanyāsaḥ praśnaḥ ca

original: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke / BBs_1,4.9 /
analyzed: jyotiḥ upakramā tu tathā hi adhīyate eke  /

original: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi jñānābhāvād atirekāc ca / BBs_1,4.11 /
analyzed: na saṃkhyā upasaṃgrahāt api jñāna abhāvāt atirekāt ca
kāraṇa tvena ca ākāśa ādiṣu yathā vyapadiṣṭa ukteḥ
jīva mukhya prāṇa liṅgāt na iti ced tat vyākhyātam

original: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke / BBs_1,4.18 /
analyzed: anya artham tu jaiminiḥ praśna vyākhyānābhyām api ca evam eke  /

original: utkramiṣyata evaṃ bhāvād ity auḍulomiḥ / BBs_1,4.21 /

analyzed: prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭānta an uparodhāt
smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na anya smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅgāt

original: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt / BBs_2,1.4 /
analyzed: na vilakṣaṇa tvāt asya tathātvam ca śabdāt

original: asad iti cen na pratiṣedhamātratvāt / BBs_2,1.7 /
analyzed: asat iti ced na pratiṣedha mātra tvāt

original: anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ / BBs_2,1.12 /
analyzed: anyathā anumeyam iti ced evam api anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: bhoktrāpatter avibhāgaś cet syāl lokavat / BBs_2,1.14 /
analyzed: bhoktṛ āpatteḥ avibhāgaḥ ced syāt loka vat
tad ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ

original: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣādyukteḥ śabdāntarāc ca / BBs_2,1.18 /
analyzed: asat vyapadeśāt na iti ced na dharma antareṇa vākyaśeṣa ādi ukteḥ śabda antarāt ca
itara vyapadeśāt dhita akaraṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ
aśma ādi vat ca tad anupapattiḥ

original: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi / BBs_2,1.24 /
analyzed: upasaṃhāra darśanāt na iti ced na kṣīravat hi
kṛtsna prasaktiḥ niravayava tva śabda kopaḥ vā

original: ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāś ca hi / BBs_2,1.28 /
analyzed: ātmani ca evam vicitrāḥ ca hi

original: vikaraṇatvān neti cet tad uktam / BBs_2,1.31 /
analyzed: vikaraṇa tvāt na iti ced tat uktam

original: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,1.34 /
analyzed: vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣa tvāt tathā hi darśayati

original: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvād upapadyate cāpy upalabhyate ca / BBs_2,1.35 /
analyzed: na karma avibhāgāt iti ced na anādi tvāt upapadyate ca api upalabhyate ca  /

original: racanānupapatteś ca nānumānaṃ pravṛtteś ca / BBs_2,2.1 /
analyzed: racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam pravṛtteḥ ca
payaḥ mbu vat ced tatra api
anyatra abhāvāt ca na tṛṇa ādi vat
puruṣa aśma vat iti ced tathā api
anyathā anumitau ca jña śakti viyogāt
mahat dīrgha vat vā hrasva parimaṇḍalābhyām
ubhayathā api na karma atas tad abhāvaḥ
rūpa ādimat tvāt ca viparyayaḥ darśanāt

original: itaretarapratyayatvād upapannam iti cen na saṅghātabhāvānimittatvāt / BBs_2,2.18 /
analyzed: itaretara pratyaya tvāt upapannam iti ced na saṅghāta bhāva animitta tvāt
vaidharmyāt ca na svapna ādi vat

original: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ / BBs_2,2.33 /
analyzed: na ca paryāyāt api avirodhaḥ vikāra ādibhyaḥ
antya avasthiteḥ ca ubhaya nitya tvāt aviśeṣaḥ
vijñāna ādi bhāve vā tad apratiṣedhaḥ
syāt ca ekasya brahma śabda vat

original: tadabhidhyānād eva tu talliṅgāt saḥ / BBs_2,3.14 /
analyzed: tad abhidhyānāt eva tu tad liṅgāt saḥ

original: viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'ta upapadyate ca / BBs_2,3.15 /

analyzed: antarā vijñāna manasī krameṇa tad liṅgāt iti ced na aviśeṣāt

original: carācaravyapāśrayas tu syāt tadvyapadeśo bhāktas tadbhāvabhāvitvāt / BBs_2,3.17 /
analyzed: carācara vyapāśrayaḥ tu syāt tad vyapadeśaḥ bhāktaḥ tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt

original: nātmā śruter nityatvāc ca tābhyaḥ / BBs_2,3.18 /
analyzed: na ātmā śruteḥ nitya tvāt ca tābhyaḥ

original: avasthitivaiśeṣyād iti cen nābhyupagamād dhṛdi hi / BBs_2,3.25 /
analyzed: avasthiti vaiśeṣyāt iti ced na abhyupagamāt hṛdi hi

original: vyatireko gandhavat tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,3.27 /
analyzed: vyatirekaḥ gandha vat tathā hi darśayati

original: yāvadātmabhāvitvāc ca na doṣas taddarśanāt / BBs_2,3.30 /
analyzed: yāvadātmabhāvi tvāt ca na doṣaḥ tad darśanāt
puṃstva ādi vat tu asya sataḥ abhivyakti yogāt  /

original: vyapadeśāc ca kriyāyāṃ na cen nirdeśaviparyayaḥ / BBs_2,3.35 /
analyzed: vyapadeśāt ca kriyāyām na ced nirdeśa viparyayaḥ
kṛta prayatna apekṣaḥ tu vihita pratiṣiddha a vaiyarthya ādibhyaḥ

original: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke / BBs_2,3.42 /
analyzed: aṃśaḥ nānā vyapadeśāt anyathā ca api dāśa kitavādi tvam adhīyate eke
prakāśa ādi vat tu na evam paraḥ
anujñā parihārau deha sambandhāt jyotiḥ ādi vat
pradeśa bhedāt iti ced na antarbhāvāt
gauṇī asaṃbhavāt tad prāk śruteḥ ca
hasta ādayaḥ tu sthite taḥ na evam
na vā āyu kriye pṛthak upadeśāt
cakṣuḥ ādi vat tu tad saha śiṣṭi ādibhyaḥ

original: akaraṇatvāc ca na doṣas tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,4.10 /
analyzed: akaraṇa tvāt ca na doṣaḥ tathā hi darśayati

original: jyotir ādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tadāmananātprāṇavatā śabdāt / BBs_2,4.13 /
analyzed: jyotiḥ ādi adhiṣṭhānam tu tad āmananāt prāṇavatā śabdāt

original: ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśād anyatra śreṣṭhāt / BBs_2,4.15 /
analyzed: te indriyāṇi tad vyapadeśāt anyatra śreṣṭhāt
saṃjñā mūrti kḷptiḥ tu trivṛt kurvataḥ upadeśāt
māṃsa ādi bhaumam yathāśabdam itarayoḥ ca

tad antara pratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśna nirūpaṇābhyām
tri ātmaka tvāt tu bhūyaḥ tvāt

original: agnyādiśruter iti cen na bhāktatvāt / BBs_3,1.4 /
analyzed: agni ādi śruteḥ iti ced na bhākta tvāt

original: prathame 'śravaṇād iti cen na tā eva hy upapatteḥ / BBs_3,1.5 /
analyzed: prathame śravaṇāt iti ced na tāḥ eva hi upapatteḥ  /

original: aśrutatvād iti cen neṣṭādikāriṇāṃ pratīteḥ / BBs_3,1.6 /
analyzed: a śruta tvāt iti ced na iṣṭa ādi kāriṇām pratīteḥ

original: bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvāt tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,1.7 /
analyzed: bhāktam vā an ātma vid tvāt tathā hi darśayati

original: caraṇād iti cen na tadupalakṣaṇārtheti kārṣṇājiniḥ / BBs_3,1.9 /
analyzed: caraṇāt iti ced na tad upalakṣaṇa arthā iti kārṣṇājiniḥ

original: ānarthakyam iti cen na tadapekṣatvāt / BBs_3,1.10 /
analyzed: ānarthakyam iti ced na tad apekṣa tvāt

aniṣṭa ādi kāriṇām api ca śrutam

original: saṃyamane tv anubhūyetareṣāmārohāv arohau tadgatidarśanāt / BBs_3,1.13 /
analyzed: saṃyamane tu anubhūya itareṣām ārohau arohau tad gati darśanāt  /

original: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt / BBs_3,1.25 /

analyzed: nirmātāram ca eke putra ādayaḥ ca

original: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau / BBs_3,2.4 /
analyzed: para abhidhyānāt tu tirohitam tatas hi asya bandha viparyayau

original: sūcakaś ca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ / BBs_3,2.6 /
analyzed: sūcakaḥ ca hi śruteḥ ācakṣate ca tad vidaḥ
tad abhāvaḥ nāḍīṣu tad śruteḥ ātmani ca
saḥ eva tu karma anusmṛti śabda vidhibhyaḥ

original: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi / BBs_3,2.11 /
analyzed: na parasya ubhaya liṅgam sarvatra hi

original: bhedād iti cen na pratyekamatadvacanāt / BBs_3,2.12 /
analyzed: bhedāt iti ced na pratyekam a tad vacanāt
a rūpavat eva hi tad pradhāna tvāt
darśayati ca atha u api smaryate  /
atas eva ca upamā sūryaka ādi vat
ambu vat agrahaṇāt tu na tathātvam
vṛddhi hrāsa bhāj tvam antarbhāvāt ubhaya sāmañjasyāt evam darśanāt ca

original: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ / BBs_3,2.21 /
analyzed: prakṛtā etāvat tvam hi pratiṣedhati tatas bravīti ca bhūyas
prakāśa ādi vat ca a vaiśeṣyam prakāśaḥ ca karmaṇi abhyāsāt
atas na antena tathā hi liṅgam
ubhaya vyapadeśāt tu ahi kuṇḍala vat
paramatas setu unmāna saṃbandha bheda vyapadeśebhyaḥ
anena sarvagata tvam āyāma śabda ādibhyaḥ
sarva vedānta pratyayam codanā ādi aviśeṣāt

original: bhedān neti ced ekasyām api / BBs_3,3.2 /
analyzed: bhedāt na iti ced ekasyām api

original: svādhyāyasya tathātve hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca tanniyamaḥ / BBs_3,3.3 /
analyzed: svādhyāyasya tathātve hi samācāre dhikārāt ca sava vat ca tad niyamaḥ  /

original: anyathātvaṃ śabdād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_3,3.6 /
analyzed: anyathātvam śabdāt iti ced na aviśeṣāt
na vā prakaraṇa bhedāt parovarīyaḥ tva ādi vat

original: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api / BBs_3,3.8 /
analyzed: saṃjñātaḥ ced tat uktam asti tu tat api

original: anvayād iti cet syād avadhāraṇāt / BBs_3,3.17 /

analyzed: saṃbhṛti dyu vyāptī api ca atas
puruṣa vidyāyām api ca itareṣām an āmnānāt
hānau tu upāyana śabda śeṣa tvāt kuśā chandaḥ stuti upagāna vat tat uktam  /

original: sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāt tathā hy anye / BBs_3,3.27 /
analyzed: sāṃparāye tartavya abhāvāt tathā hi anye  /

original: gater arthavattvam ubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ / BBs_3,3.29 /
analyzed: gateḥ arthavat tvam ubhayathā anyathā hi virodhaḥ
upapannaḥ tad lakṣaṇa artha upalabdheḥ loka vat
akṣara dhiyām tu avarodhaḥ sāmānya tad bhāvābhyām aupasada vat tat uktam  /

original: antarā bhūtagrāmavatsvātmano 'nyathā bhedānupapattir iti cen nopadeśavat / BBs_3,3.35 /
analyzed: antarā bhūta grāma vat svātmanaḥ nyathā bheda anupapattiḥ iti ced na upadeśa vat
kāma ādi itaratra tatra ca āyatana ādibhyaḥ
tad nirdhāraṇa aniyamaḥ tad dṛṣṭeḥ pṛthak hi apratibandhaḥ phalam
liṅga bhūyaḥ tvāt tat hi balīyaḥ tat api
pūrva vikalpaḥ prakaraṇāt syāt kriyā mānasa vat
vidyā eva tu nirdhāraṇāt darśanāt ca
śruti ādi balīyaḥ tvāt ca na bādhaḥ  /
anubandha ādibhyaḥ prajñā antara pṛthaktva vat dṛṣṭaḥ ca tat uktam
na sāmānyāt api upalabdheḥ mṛtyu vat na hi loka āpattiḥ

original: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.50 /
analyzed: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyam bhūyaḥ tvāt tu anubandhaḥ  /
vyatirekaḥ tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt na tu upalabdhi vat

original: aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam / BBs_3,3.53 /
analyzed: aṅga avabaddhā astu na śākhāsu hi prativedam

original: bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyasvaṃ tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,3.55 /
analyzed: bhūmnaḥ kratu vat jyāyasvam tathā hi darśayati

original: kāmyāstu yathākāmaṃ samuccīyeranna vā pūrvahetvabhāvāt / BBs_3,3.58 /
analyzed: kāmyāḥ tu yathākāmam samuccīyeran na vā pūrva hetu abhāvāt

adhika upadeśāt tu bādarāyaṇasya evam tad darśanāt

original: stutimātram upādānād iti cen nāpūrvatvāt / BBs_3,4.21 /
analyzed: stuti mātram upādānāt iti ced na apūrva tvāt

original: pāriplavārthā iti cen na viśeṣitatvāt / BBs_3,4.23 /
analyzed: pāriplava arthāḥ iti ced na viśeṣita tvāt
atas eva ca agni indhana ādi anapekṣā
sarva apekṣā ca yajña ādi śruteḥ aśva vat

original: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt / BBs_3,4.27 /
analyzed: śama dama ādi upetaḥ syāt tathā api tu tad vidheḥ tad aṅga tayā teṣām api avaśya anuṣṭheya tvāt  /

original: sarvān nānumatiś ca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt / BBs_3,4.28 /
analyzed: sarvān na anumatiḥ ca prāṇātyaye tad darśanāt
vihita tvāt ca āśrama karma api
sarvathā api te eva ubhaya liṅgāt
antarā ca api tu tad dṛṣṭeḥ

original: atas tv itarajjyāyo liṅgāc ca / BBs_3,4.39 /
analyzed: atas tu itarat jyāyaḥ liṅgāt ca  /

original: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /
analyzed: tad bhūtasya tu na a tad bhāvaḥ jaimineḥ api niyamāt tad rūpa abhāvebhyaḥ

original: na cādhikārikam api patanānumānāt tadayogāt / BBs_3,4.41 /
analyzed: na ca ādhikārikam api patana anumānāt tad ayogāt

original: upapūrvam apīty eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
analyzed: upa pūrvam api iti eke bhāvam aśana vat tat uktam  /

original: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
analyzed: bahis tu ubhayathā api smṛteḥ ācārāt ca

original: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
analyzed: ārtvijyam iti auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate  /

original: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.46 /
analyzed: sahakāri antara vidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyam tadvataḥ vidhi ādi vat
evam mukti phala aniyamaḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ
ātmā iti tu upagacchanti grāhayanti ca

original: na pratīke na hi saḥ / BBs_4,1.4 /

analyzed: āditya ādi matayaḥ ca aṅge upapatteḥ  /
tad adhigame uttara pūrva aghayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau tad vyapadeśāt

original: itarasyāpy evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu / BBs_4,1.14 /
analyzed: itarasya api evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu

original: anārabdhakārye eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ / BBs_4,1.15 /
analyzed: anārabdha kārye eva tu pūrve tad avadheḥ
agnihotra ādi tu tad kāryāya eva tad darśanāt
atas nya api hi ekeṣām ubhayoḥ  /

original: bhogena tv itare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate / BBs_4,1.19 /
analyzed: bhogena tu itare kṣapayitvā atha saṃpadyate  /
saḥ dhī akṣe tad upagama ādibhyaḥ
samānā ca asṛti upakramāt amṛta tvam ca an upoṣya

original: pratiṣedhād iti cen na śārīrāt spaṣṭo hyekeṣām / BBs_4,2.12 /
analyzed: pratiṣedhāt iti ced na śārīrāt spaṣṭaḥ hi ekeṣām

original: tāni pare tathā hy āha / BBs_4,2.14 /

analyzed: tad oka ugra jvalanam tad prakāśita dvāraḥ vidyā sāmarthyāt tad śeṣa gati anusmṛti yogāt

original: niśi neti cen na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca / BBs_4,2.18 /
analyzed: niśi nā iti ced na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvi tvāt darśayati ca

original: yoginaḥ prati smaryete smārte caite / BBs_4,2.20 /
analyzed: yoginaḥ prati smaryete smārte ca ete

original: kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ param abhidhānāt / BBs_4,3.9 /
analyzed: kārya atyaye tad adhyakṣeṇa saha atas param abhidhānāt

original: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca / BBs_4,3.14 /
analyzed: a pratīka ālambanāt nayati iti bādarāyaṇaḥ ubhayathā ca doṣāt tad kratuḥ ca
citi tanmātreṇa tad ātmaka tvāt iti auḍulomiḥ

original: evam apy upanyāsāt pūrvabhāvād avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ / BBs_4,4.7 /
analyzed: evam api upanyāsāt pūrva bhāvāt avirodham bādarāyaṇaḥ  /
atas eva ca an anya adhipatiḥ

original: abhāvaṃ bādarir āha hy evam / BBs_4,4.10 /

analyzed: pradīpa vat āveśaḥ tathā hi darśayati
sva apyaya saṃpatyoḥ anyatara apekṣam āviṣkṛtam hi
jagat vyāpāra varjam prakaraṇāt asaṃnihita tvāt ca
pratyakṣa upadeśāt iti ced na ādhikārika maṇḍala stha ukteḥ

original: vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha / BBs_4,4.19 /
analyzed: vikāra āvarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha
